titleStmt.title: A letter with a narrative, written to the right Hon:ble Thomas Allen Lord Major of London, &e. [sic] concerning a strange sight that appeared over this city of London, in the yeare 1642. when the King was driven from his Parliament, dated as followeth
titleStmt.author: Butter, Nathaniel, d. 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Nath. Butter, residing in Cursitors Alley,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: N.B., i.e. Nathaniel Butter.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
